startways_nexus.title: Startways Nexus - Central Command
startways_nexus.description: The colossal seed-compass has been reconfigured as a mission center. Four major crisis paths pulse with urgent light, each requiring your immediate attention. The route steward presents you with critical briefings as trade routes collapse and diplomats vanish.

choices.text: [POLITICAL CRISIS] Investigate the missing Root Assembly delegates
choices.details: Current objective: Three key delegates have vanished during crucial guest-law negotiations. Their disappearance threatens to destabilize the entire archipelago's legal framework.

choices.text: [TRADE DISRUPTION] Address the escalating cartel price wars
choices.details: Current objective: The Prism Cartel's market manipulation is bankrupting smaller traders. Communities are being cut off from essential supplies.
Current objective: Strange resonances from the Singing Depths are interfering with navigation systems. Several transport routes have failed catastrophically.

choices.text: [NETWORK COLLAPSE] Repair the failing transport grid
choices.details: Current objective: The storm-rail network is experiencing systematic failures. Remote communities are becoming isolated and desperate.
